item.title: Solapur Shocker: 4-Year-Old Aarohi Killed In Stone-Pelting Incident On Vijayapura-Raichur Passenger Train
item.description:
<![CDATA[Solapur Shocker: 4-Year-Old Aarohi Killed In Stone-Pelting Incident On Vijayapura-Raichur Passenger Train |
In a shocking incident, a four-year-old girl was killed in a stone-pelting attack on the Vijayapura-Raichur passenger train on Sunday. The girl's name was Shivani alias Aarohi Ajit Kangre. Police said that a search is underway to identify the person who threw the stone.
Aarohi was returning to her home in Hosnal taluka on Sunday after a pilgrimage on the Vijayapura-Raichur passenger trai...]]>
item.author: Fpj Web Desk
